scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn deployment && yarn sync
scripts.deployment: git add dist ; git add horsey.es5.js ; npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} ; git add package.json ; git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" ; git push --tags ; npm publish ; git push
scripts.scripts: jshint . && babel --presets @babel/preset-env --out-file horsey.es5.js horsey.js && browserify -s horsey -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -do dist/horsey.js horsey.js && terser -m -c -o dist/horsey.min.js dist/horsey.js
scripts.start: watchify -vs horsey -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -do dist/horsey.js horsey.js & stylus -w horsey.styl -o dist
scripts.styles: stylus horsey.styl -o dist && cleancss dist/horsey.css -o dist/horsey.min.css
scripts.sync: git checkout gh-pages ; git merge master ; git push ; git checkout master
